pdfDocuments.templateName: (function() { var conf = (CS.Service.config && !_.isEmpty(CS.Service.config)) ? CS.Service.config : config; return 'Customer confirmation form' + ( conf && conf.Quote_Reference_0 ? conf.Quote_Reference_0.attr['cscfga__' + 'Value__c'] : ''); }())

(function() { var conf = (CS.Service.config && !_.isEmpty(CS.Service.config)) ? CS.Service.config : config; return 'Quote PDF' + ( conf && conf.Quote_Reference_0 ? conf.Quote_Reference_0.attr['cscfga__' + 'Value__c'] : ''); }())

(function() { var conf = (CS.Service.config && !_.isEmpty(CS.Service.config)) ? CS.Service.config : config; return 'Installation notes' + ( conf && conf.Quote_Reference_0 ? conf.Quote_Reference_0.attr['cscfga__' + 'Value__c'] : ''); }())
(function() { var config = CS.Service.config; return 'Finance Illustration' + ( config && config.Quote_Reference_0 ? config.Quote_Reference_0.attr['cscfga__' + 'Value__c'] : ''); }())

Appointment__c.filter: Assigned_To__r.Salesforce_User__c = {CURRENT USER} AND Status__c != 'Cancelled' AND (Start__c = LAST_N_DAYS:29 OR Start__c = NEXT_N_DAYS:8)
Appointment__c.filterActual: Assigned_To__r.Salesforce_User__c = {CURRENT USER} AND Status__c != 'Cancelled' AND (Start__c = LAST_N_DAYS:29 OR Start__c = NEXT_N_DAYS:8)
Appointment__c.label: Appointment

Opportunity.filterActual: Id IN (SELECT Opportunity__c FROM Appointment__c WHERE Assigned_To__r.Salesforce_User__c = {CURRENT USER} AND Status__c != 'Cancelled' AND (Start__c = LAST_N_DAYS:29 OR Start__c = NEXT_N_DAYS:8))
Opportunity.label: Opportunity

cscfga__Product_Basket__c.filter: cscfga__Opportunity__c IN ({OPPORTUNITY IDS}) AND LastModifiedDate > {LAST SYNC DATE}
cscfga__Product_Basket__c.filterActual: cscfga__Opportunity__c IN ({OPPORTUNITY IDS}) AND LastModifiedDate > {LAST SYNC DATE}
cscfga__Product_Basket__c.deleteFilter: cscfga__Opportunity__c IN ({OPPORTUNITY IDS}) AND Appointment__c != NULL AND Appointment__c IN ({APPOINTMENT__c IDS})
cscfga__Product_Basket__c.deleteFilterActual: cscfga__Opportunity__c IN ({OPPORTUNITY IDS}) AND Appointment__c != NULL AND Appointment__c IN ({APPOINTMENT__c IDS})
cscfga__Product_Basket__c.label: Quote

lookupQueries.Lookup(BoilerCylinderPartAssociationQuer: SELECT {CS_Part_Association__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part_Association__c} WHERE {CS_Part_Association__c:Part_2_Type__c} = 'CST' AND {CS_Part_Association__c:Part_1__c} = '[Boiler Part Id]' AND {CS_Part_Association__c:Part_2_Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part_Association__c:Part_2_Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part_Association__c:Relationship__c} = 'Has Default'
lookupQueries.Lookup(BoilerProgrammerPartAssociationQu: SELECT {CS_Part_Association__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part_Association__c} WHERE {CS_Part_Association__c:Part_1__c} = '[Boiler Part Id]' AND {CS_Part_Association__c:Part_2_Type__c} = 'PRG' AND {CS_Part_Association__c:Part_2_Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part_Association__c:Part_2_Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part_Association__c:Relationship__c} = 'Has Default'
lookupQueries.Lookup(BoilerQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Power_Upper__c} >= '[Total Heat Loss Adjusted]' AND {CS_Part__c:Power_Lower__c} <= '[Total Heat Loss Adjusted]' AND {CS_Part__c:Bathroom_Zone__c} <= '[Bathroom Zone]' AND {CS_Part__c:Fuel_Type__c} = '[Fuel Type]' AND {CS_Part__c:Record_Type_Name__c} = 'Boiler' AND {CS_Part__c:Loft_Formula__c} LIKE '%[Loft]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Min_Height__c} <= '[Height]' AND {CS_Part__c:Min_Width__c} <= '[Width]' AND {CS_Part__c:Min_Depth__c} <= '[Depth]' AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region]%' AND {CS_Part__c:System__c} = '[System Type Required]'
lookupQueries.Lookup(BoilerThermostatPartAssociationQu: SELECT {CS_Part_Association__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part_Association__c} WHERE {CS_Part_Association__c:Part_2_Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part_Association__c:Relationship__c} = 'Has Default' AND {CS_Part_Association__c:Part_2_Type__c} = 'RST' AND {CS_Part_Association__c:Part_1__c} = '[Boiler Part Id]' AND {CS_Part_Association__c:Part_2_Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part_Association__c:Part_2_Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographical Region]%'
lookupQueries.Lookup(BundleQuery): SELECT {CS_Bundle__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Bundle__c} WHERE {CS_Bundle__c:Location_Type__c} = '[Location Type]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:System_Type__c} = '[System Type]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Power_Input_Max__c} > '[Total Heat Loss Adjusted]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Power_Input_Min__c} <= '[Total Heat Loss Adjusted]'
lookupQueries.Lookup(CondensateQuery): SELECT {CS_Bundle__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Bundle__c} WHERE {CS_Bundle__c:Termination_Location__c} = '[Termination Point]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Soakaway_Required__c} = '[Soakaway Required]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Type__c} = 'Condensate' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Pumped__c} = '[Condensate Pumped]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Colour__c} = '[Pipework Colour]'
lookupQueries.Lookup(ContactLookupQuery): SELECT {Contact:_soup} FROM {Contact} WHERE {Contact:AccountId} = '[Appointment Account Id]' AND {Contact:cs_Primary_Contact_Formula__c} = 1
lookupQueries.Lookup(ControlBundleQuery): SELECT {CS_Bundle__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Bundle__c} WHERE {CS_Bundle__c:Control_Group__c} = '[Control Group]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:System_ID__c} = '[System Id]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Type__c} = 'Control'
lookupQueries.Lookup(CylinderThermostatQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Type__c} = 'CST' AND {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographical Region]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Specific_Formula__c} = 0 AND {CS_Part__c:Record_Type_Name__c} = 'Control'
lookupQueries.Lookup(DefaultControlBundlePartCylinderQ: SELECT {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c} WHERE {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Part_Type__c} = 'CST' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Type__c} = 'Default' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Bundle__c} = '[Control Bundle Id]' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%'
lookupQueries.Lookup(DefaultControlBundlePartProgramme: SELECT {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c} WHERE {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Bundle__c} = '[Control Bundle Id]' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Part_Type__c} = 'PRG' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographical Region]%' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Type__c} = 'Default'
lookupQueries.Lookup(DefaultControlBundlePartThermosta: SELECT {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c} WHERE {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographical Region]%' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Type__c} = 'Default' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Bundle__c} = '[Control Bundle Id]' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Part_Type__c} = 'RST' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1
lookupQueries.Lookup(EarthingQuery): SELECT {CS_Bundle__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Bundle__c} WHERE {CS_Bundle__c:Type__c} = 'Earthing' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Earth_System_Type__c} = '[Earth System Type]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Visible_Earth__c} = '[Visible Earth]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Socket_and_See_Result__c} = '[Socket and See Result]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Customer_to_Arrange__c} = '[Customer to Arrange]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Working_VOELCB__c} = '[Working VOELCB]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:RCD__c} = '[RCD]'
lookupQueries.Lookup(FlueBundleQueryOLD): SELECT {CS_Bundle__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Bundle__c} WHERE {CS_Bundle__c:Type__c} = 'Flue' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Orientation__c} = '[Orientation]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Plume_Required__c} = '[Plume Kit Required]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Roof_Type__c} = '[Roof Type]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Route_Location__c} = '[Route Location]'
lookupQueries.Lookup(PackCInstallationPackQry): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Work_without_a_Boiler_Formula__c} LIKE '%[WWB]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Subcategory__c} = '[Pack C Subcategory]' AND {CS_Part__c:Pack_C_Category__c} = '[Pack C Category]' AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographical Region]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Installation_Pack_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%'

lookupQueries.Lookup(PartFlueBoilerQueryOLD): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Flue_Boiler_Groups_Formula__c} LIKE '%[Boiler Group]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Record_Type_Name__c} = 'Flue' AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographical Region]%'
lookupQueries.Lookup(PartFlueBoilerQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Flue_Boiler_Groups_Formula__c} LIKE '%[Boiler Group]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Record_Type_Name__c} = 'Flue' AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographical Region]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Arrangement__c} LIKE '%[Arrangement]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Flue_Extra_Formula__c} = 1

lookupQueries.Lookup(PartPriceLookupQuery): SELECT {CS_Part_Price__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part_Price__c} WHERE {CS_Part_Price__c:CS_Pricebook_Type__c} = '[Pricebook Type]' AND {CS_Part_Price__c:District_Code__c} IS NULL AND {CS_Part_Price__c:Part__c} = '[Placeholder]' AND ({CS_Part_Price__c:Start_Date_Formula__c} = 0 OR {CS_Part_Price__c:Start_Date_Formula__c} < '[Quote Creation Date]') AND ({CS_Part_Price__c:End_Date_Formula__c} = 0 OR {CS_Part_Price__c:End_Date_Formula__c} >= '[Quote Creation Date]')
lookupQueries.Lookup(PartPropertyTypePackQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Part_Code__c} = '[Property Type Pack]' AND {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1
lookupQueries.Lookup(PartRadiatorValveQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region Shadow]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Subcategory__c} LIKE '%Radiator%' AND {CS_Part__c:Pack_C_Category__c} = 'System Controls'
lookupQueries.Lookup(PartScaffoldingQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region Shadow]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Type__c} = 'Scaffolding'
lookupQueries.Lookup(PlaceholderRadiatorLookupQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Record_Type_Name__c} = 'Radiator' AND {CS_Part__c:Radiator_Category__c} LIKE '%[Radiator Category]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Is_Placeholder_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1
lookupQueries.Lookup(ProgrammerQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographical Region]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Record_Type_Name__c} = 'Control' AND {CS_Part__c:Type__c} = 'PRG' AND {CS_Part__c:Specific_Formula__c} = 0
lookupQueries.Lookup(RadiatorFittingPackQuery): SELECT {CS_Bundle__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Bundle__c} WHERE {CS_Bundle__c:Type__c} = 'Fitting Pack' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Fitting_Pack__c} = '[Fitting Pack]'
lookupQueries.Lookup(RadiatorLookuopQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Is_Placeholder_Formula__c} = 0 AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Record_Type_Name__c} = 'Radiator' AND {CS_Part__c:Radiator_Category__c} = '[Radiator Category]' AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Low_Surface_Temp__c} = '[Low Surface Temp]'
lookupQueries.Lookup(Thermostat1Query): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Specific_Formula__c} = 0 AND {CS_Part__c:Type__c} = 'RST' AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographical Region]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Record_Type_Name__c} = 'Control' AND ({CS_Part__c:System__c} = '[System Id]' OR {CS_Part__c:System__c} = 'All')
lookupQueries.Lookup(WWBBundleLookupQuery): SELECT {CS_Bundle__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Bundle__c} WHERE {CS_Bundle__c:Electric_Work_Type__c} = '[Electric Work Type]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Drained__c} = '[System To Be Drained]' AND {CS_Bundle__c:Type__c} = 'WWB'
lookupQueries.Lookup(PipeInBundleQuery): SELECT {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c} WHERE {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Bundle__c} = '[Core Bundle ID]' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Part_Code__c} = '[PipePackID]'

lookupQueries.Lookup(ShowerLookupQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Type__c} = '[Shower Type]' AND {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region Shadow]%'
lookupQueries.Lookup(FireLookupQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Fuel_Type__c} = '[Fire Type]' AND {CS_Part__c:Part_Code__c} LIKE '%CAPF%' AND {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region Shadow]%'
lookupQueries.Lookup(HearthLookupQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Type__c} = '[Hearth Lookup Type]' AND {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region Shadow]%'
lookupQueries.Lookup(PanelLookupQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Type__c} = '[Job Type]' AND {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region Shadow]%'
lookupQueries.Lookup(RadiatorLookUpQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Is_Placeholder_Formula__c} = 0 AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Record_Type_Name__c} = 'Radiator' AND {CS_Part__c:Radiator_Category__c} = '[Radiator Category]' AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1
lookupQueries.Lookup(ActualRadiatorLookUpQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Is_Placeholder_Formula__c} = 0 AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region Shadow]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Group__c} = 'RAD' AND {CS_Part__c:Model__c} LIKE '%[Model Range]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Manufacturer__c} LIKE '%[Manufacturer]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Output__c} <= '[PowerUpper]' AND {CS_Part__c:Output__c} >= '[PowerLower]' AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1
lookupQueries.Lookup(AvailableFluePartsQuery): SELECT {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c} WHERE {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Bundle_Type__c} = 'Multiselect' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Bundle_Arrangement__c} = '[Arrangement]' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Part_Boiler_Group__c} LIKE '%[Boiler Group]%' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographical Region]%' AND {CS_Bundle_Part_Association__c:Part_Record_Type_Name__c} = 'Flue'
lookupQueries.Lookup(suspectMaterialRemovalPackQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region Shadow]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Type__c} = 'Asbestos' AND {CS_Part__c:Part_Code__c} NOT IN ('P1972','P1973','PP26','PP27','PP28','PP29')
lookupQueries.Lookup(AdditionalHivePartQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE ({CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Type__c} = '[Product Category]' AND {CS_Part__c:Project_Code__c} IN ([Included Projects])) OR ({CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region Shadow]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Type__c} = '[Product Category]')
lookupQueries.Lookup(ManualRadiatorValveQuery): SELECT {CS_Part__c:_soup} FROM {CS_Part__c} WHERE {CS_Part__c:Active_Formula__c} = 1 AND {CS_Part__c:Exists_in_Pricebooks__c} LIKE '%[Pricebook Type]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Included_In_Regions__c} LIKE '%[Geographic Region Shadow]%' AND {CS_Part__c:Subcategory__c} = 'Standard Radiator Valves'
